name: Flexio
title: Fullstack Developer
responsibilities: Led the transition of app development from external teams to internal teams, ensuring a smooth integration into the final product, leading to major investments.
Developed an app in Flutter, taking full ownership and reducing dependency on external teams.
Implemented Scrum methodology to optimize team management, focusing on collaboration and continuous delivery of valuable solutions.
UX/UI Design: Actively participated in creating wireframes, interactive prototypes, and improving the user experience using Figma and other design tools.
Collaborated with both frontend/backend developers and UX/UI designers to ensure a consistent and fluid user experience across all components of the app.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, including UX/UI designers and product owners, to ensure that designs aligned with user needs and business goals.

name: AVR Media Group
title: Fullstack Developer
responsibilities: Developed and managed websites and landing pages from concept to deployment, working closely with design teams to ensure UX/UI requirements were met.
UX/UI Design & Technical Feasibility: Conducted technical assessments for UI designs to ensure they aligned with best design practices, accessibility, and performance standards.
Worked with Figma and Sketch to create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs, providing feedback on the feasibility and practicality of design ideas in collaboration with design teams.
